headline: BofA Lowers PT on Robinhood Markets, Inc. (HOOD) Stock
summary: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) is among the 10 Unstoppable Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next 3 Years. Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) is one of the Unstoppable Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next 3 Years. On February 25, BofA analyst Craig Siegenthaler reduced its price objective on the company’s stock to $122 […]
